column4: hi I hope somebody can help me solve my problem, I can't use my headphones... I have no "Headphone Jack Sense" on my volume control, my soundcard is SI7012
also not in the switches section ?
when i check my prefs there's no headphone control either
not sure how to fix it , you could check in prefs of volumecontrol if jacksense is there so you can tic it to make it functional
